content: We are well aware of the fact that he is a specialist in that language. Nevertheless, he is not allowed to adopt any sentence written in it, since that isn't his mother tongue.
translations: ita:Sappiamo perfettamente che si Ã¨ specializzato in quella lingua, ma non possiamo permettere di prendere qualsiasi frase s
